title: Instructional Design Decision-Making Strategies in Organizational Anarchy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A process for current secondary mathematics teachers to strengthen decision-making competencies for effective instructional design within organizational constraints.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three instructional design decision factors arising from organizational anarchy
Learners can apply a framework to compare/evaluate instructional design decision-making styles through literature analysis
Learners can establish design strategies to minimize problem latency tailored to mathematics subject characteristics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
